directions: In a saucepan, combine soy sauce, mirin, orange juice, pineapple, Granny Smith apple, garlic, ginger, and half of the sugar; bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 20 minutes. Adjust sweetness to taste with remaining sugar. Strain through a fine mesh sieve; cool.
ingredients: 6 ounces chopped fresh pineapple with skin
1 Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
title: Japanese Style Teriyaki Sauce
